snippet.title: Swords & Soldiers 2 - Announcement Teaser
snippet.description:
http://www.swordsandsoldiers2.com
http://www.facebook.com/SwordsAndSoldiers
http://twitter.com/RonimoGames

Sharpen your axe, grab a tankard o' mead, and light up the barbecue! Ronimo Games is proud to announce Swords & Soldiers II is coming as a downloadable game for the WiiU! A sequel to the 2009 original, Swords & Soldiers II sends Redbeard and his gang of burly Vikings on an all-new adventure, making new friends and facing new enemies. This isn't just about who can organize the best barbecue party anymore -- this time the world also needs some serious saving!

More information on the new side-scrolling strategy game will be unveiled at GDC and PAX East!
